department.ch: 遙測科技碩士學位學程
department.en: Master of Science Program in Remote Sensing Science and Technology

goal.ch:
1. 運用所學的知識和批判性思維技能，結合適當的遙測數據與AI技術，應對水文氣象極端事件與環境問題。
2. 開發多步驟的工作流程，以解決水文氣象極端事件和環境問題。
goal.en:
Upon completion of the course, students are expected to be able to:
1.apply acquired knowledge and critical thinking skills to tackle hydro-meteorological extremes and environmental issues with appropriate remote sensing data and AI techniques
2.develop multi-step workflows to solve problems in hydro-meteorological extremes and environmental issues

outline.ch: 本課程涵蓋氣候極端事件與環境問題的相關主題，並探討如何利用GIS、遙測和人工智慧工具對其進行評估和監測。課程將從遙測與GIS的簡介開始，包括GIS軟體使用的教程。課程的科學研究內容包括氣候變遷的監測與預測、針對乾旱和颱風等水文氣象極端事件的遙測光譜指數、生态环境脆弱性、空氣品質、城市綠地與城市熱島效應，以及機器學習技術。學生將有機會參與一個與氣候極端事件和環境問題相關的研究專題。在整個課程中，將展示科學研究領域中使用的分析技術，以供學生學習並應用於自己的工作中。這些技術包括使用光學、微波和雷達等衛星影像，分析地表水資源的新遙測指數，以及機器學習和AI算法。學生將提出一個研究主題，並在課程結束時運用所學知識和技術展示他們的研究成果。
outline.en: This course covers topics of weather extremes, environmental issues and how these can be assessed and monitored using GIS, remote sensing and artificial intelligence tools. The course will begin with an introduction to remote sensing and GIS including tutorials on the use of GIS software. The scientific research material of the course covers climate change monitoring and projection, remote sensing spectral indices for hydro-meteorological extremes such as droughts and typhoons, eco-environmental vulnerability, air quality, urban greenspace and urban heat island, and machine learning techniques. Students will have the opportunity to work on a research project related to weather extremes and environmental issues. Throughout the course, techniques used for analysis in the scientific research areas will be demonstrated for students to learn and apply in their own work. These include the use of satellite imagery such as optical, microwave, and radar, new remote sensing indices for surface water availability analysis, and machine learning and AI algorithms. The students will propose a research topic and later present their own results using the knowledge and techniques learned from the course.
